text: every morning presents an opportunity a
chance to either take a step forward or
stay stuck in the same habits that drain
and frustrate us look at Henry he went
to the gym earlier and now he's laser
focused in his latest project he's
glowing deep down we all wish we could
be like him but it feels almost
unattainable or is it maybe he knows
something we
don't and then there's Jimmy still in
bed scrolling through Tik Tok trying to
distract himself from the weight of
everything he knows he should be doing
many of us are like Jimmy we wake up
every day with big plans but before we
know it hours have disappeared our to-do
list is untouched and by evening we feel
empty stuck and more frustrated than
ever hey Jimmy you've been lying here a
while now haven't
you yeah yeah it felt kind of good at
first if any mean
interesting comments cool videos but now
I don't know I just feel empty I know I
should get up and do something but I
just don't have the
energy how does Henry do it he's always
so focused early morning walks
productive workday workouts and somehow
he still makes time for friends
meanwhile I can't even get out of
bed H nobody is born with magical
motivation Jimmy let me let you in on a
little secret Henry wasn't always like
this he didn't wake up one day loving
workouts and spreadsheets no one does
see even Henry used to
struggle wait Henry the guy who seems
like he's got it all figured out he
procrastinated too yep just like you but
something changed for him he figured out
something most of us don't waiting to
feel like it doesn't
work so what did he do what's the
secret let's start with this stand up I
want to show you
[Music]
something see that lamp over there
imagine a moth flying around it chasing
the glow flapping harder and harder
draining itself but Jimmy the lamp
doesn't love the moth back does
it wait are you calling me a moth no
Jimmy I'm saying we've all been there
like you like me like the moth chasing
something that doesn't give back it's
not your fault those apps videos and
even games they're designed to keep you
glued to the screen according to Tristan
Harris a TCH addiction expert companies
poor billions into making their products
addictive stealing your time and
attention every click every swipe every
level you complete they want you to keep
coming back for more it's no wonder
meaningful tasks feel harder easy
distractions always win unless you
reframe them reframe what do you mean
ever notice how you label tasks with
should like I should clean my room or I
should work
out yeah isn't that normal sure but
here's the catch sh feels like an
obligation and we resist obligations
even self-imposed ones let's take a page
from Henry's book instead of saying I
should go to the gym Henry started
saying I want to feel stronger and
healthier cognitive reframing is
basically changing how you perceive an
activity before you even start it a
simple Chef that yields amazing
results huh I never thought of it that
way let's try it think of one thing
you've been
avoiding uh cleaning my desk now reframe
it uh I want a tidy space where I can
think
clearly great it seems small but it is
powerful but what if I still don't feel
like it that's okay motivation doesn't
come first action does just start small
for example don't think about riding the
whole essay just open your laptop don't
plan to run a marathon just put on your
sneak sers psychologists call this the
foot in the door technique just taking
the first step builds momentum and once
you start the Good Feelings Will Follow
the study in motivation science found
that people enjoy productive tasks far
more than they expect but only once they
start remember the last time you had a
big project or assignment hanging over
your head yeah I procrastinated for days
then freaked out and stayed up all night
finishing it exact ly and how did it
feel once you got started and actually
made progress honestly it felt pretty
great I even thought why didn't I start
the sooner exactly doing what's good for
you actually feels good you've already
experienced this it's not a
theory okay but what about when you
spend all day doing nothing scrolling
stacking wasting time let me guess you
felt anxious bored maybe even a little
angry with yourself right yeah it's like
I'm wasting my life that's proof that
doing what's unhealthy for you feels bad
too you've just been brainwashed to
think
otherwise one more thing what's a small
treat you love ooh a latte from that
Cafe
downtown perfect finish cleaning your
desk and that latte is yours studies
show that rewarding yourself makes the
task more enjoyable and repeatable
Lasting fulfillment is created by the
little choices we make every day the
ones that move us closer to the life we
truly want you started something today a
small step toward a better you and
that's all it takes one step then
another The World Isn't waiting for
Perfection it's waiting for you every
effort every tiny win it all adds up
remember it's not about doing what you
want to do all at once it's about
starting so keep going Jimmy because
you're not just changing your day you're
changing your
life reframe tasks start small reward
progress
